slide1.title: What is Helios
slide1.description: Helios is a source finder, it scrapes third-party sites (called providers) that are publicly available on the internet.
slide1.declaimer: Helios does not host, upload or manage any of the content on these sites and Heliosâ€™s add-on, staff and/or developers have no control over the content on these third party sites. Helios claims no responsibility for copyright, legality, accuracy, compliance, decency or any other aspect of the content displayed. It is positively the responsibility of the end user to avoid any actions that may constitute a violation of national, federal or terrestrial laws applicable to them.

slide2.title: Add some providers
slide2.description: As said earlier, Helios relies on providers to find sources, so let's add some

slide3.title: Choose quality
slide3.description: Select the highest quality you want to play

slide4.title: Debrid Account
slide4.description: If you want to play sources without any buffering issue, it's recommended to connect Helios to a debrid service

slide5.title: Where to play?
slide5.description: Helios can play the source on different player, select your default player

slide6.title: All done
slide6.description: You're all done, if you want to change these settings, go into Wako > Settings > Addons > Helios > Settings page

enabledSource.howItWorks: For performance reason, it's recommended to only enable the best quality you prefer. If less than 20 sources are found for this quality, then the lower quality will be used until the lowest quality is reach

realDebrid.explain: RealDebrid is an unrestricted downloader that allows you to quickly download files hosted on the internet

premiumize.explain:
Premiumize.me is an unrestricted downloader (and more) that allows you to quickly download files hosted on the internet.

Moreover Premiumize let you test their service for free (you can play one file with a maximum filesize of 5 GB every 120 minutes)

kodi.hostUnreachable: Ouch, your kodi host {{hostName}} is unreachable

providers.providerUrlFailedToAdd: Failed to add Providers, please check the given URL

cloud-account.needToAddProviders: You need to add some providers to enjoy debrid services.

toasts.elementumNotInstalled: To use Elementum kodi add-on, you have to install it on kodi

selectLink.openTitle: This source has multiple links, which one you want to open?

sources.statsInfo: Note: Duplicated torrents are removed from the torrents list
